definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: spread out, spread (NH id.; Ar. fara4a Targum [[פְּרַס]] (rare), Syr. pras; cf. As. parasËu, fly (der. Spec.; prop. spread [wings]); v. also Nö:ZA i. 417);—

spread out a garment ([[שִׂמְלָה]]) Ju Jdg 8:25, + [[לִפְנֵי]] pers. De 22:17; —wings De 32:11, 1Ki 6:27 (rd. [[כַּנְפֵיהֶם]] LXX Sta Kmp Kit Benz), + [[עַל]] Je 49:22 (fig), + [[אֶל]] Je 48:40, 1Ki 8:7 = 2Ch 5:3 ([[עַל]]), + [[ל]] Job 39:26, [[לְמַעְלָה]] Ex 25:20, Ex 37:9; wings om. 1Ch 28:18 and perhaps 2Ch 3:13 (del. Ho 5:1 ([[עַל]] loc.), Ps 140:6, [[לְרַגְלַי]] La 1:13, c. [[עַל]] pers. Ho 7:12 (of ´[[י]], Ez Eze 12:13 = Eze 17:20, Eze 19:8, Eze 32:3, [[עַל־עְֲָמָיו]] Pr 29:5; [[כַּפַּיִם]] ´[[פ]] in prayer, + [[אַל]] Ex 9:29, Ex 9:33 (J), 1Ki 8:38 = 2Ch 6:29, Ezr 9:5, Job 11:13, +, [[ל]] Ps 44:21, +, [[הַשָּׁמַיִם]] 1Ki 8:22 = 2Ch 6:13 ([[הַשָּׁמָָיְמָה]]), 1Ki 8:54, no complem. 2Ch 6:12; of almsgiving, [[כַּפָּהּ פָּֽרְשָׂה לֶעָנִי]] Pr 31:20; [[יַד]] ´[[פ]], c. [[עַל]] rei, La 1:10 of enemy's greed (si vera l., v. Bu); spread out = display [[וּכְסִיל]] [[יִפְרשׁׂ אִוֶּלֶת]] Pr 13:16.

spread covering over 2Sa 17:19 ([[מָסָח]] + [[עַל־פְּנֵי]] rei), [[הַמַּכְבֵּר]] over ([[עַל]]) face of another 2Ki 8:15, [[כָּנָף]] skirt, [[עַל]] pers. Ru 3:9, Ez Eze 16:8 (fig. of ´[[י]]); [[בֶּגֶּד]] c. [[עַל]] rei Nu 4:7, Nu 4:8, Nu 4:11, Nu 4:13 c. [[מִלְמָָעְלָה]] v6; [[כְּסוּי]] c, rei v:Nu 4:14; [[אֶת־הָאׂהֶל]], c. [[עַל־הַמִּשְׁכָּן]] Ex 40:19; [[שַׁחַר פָּרֻשׂ עַל־הֶהָרִים]] Joe 2:2; of ´[[י]] [[עָנָן]] ´[[פ]] [[לְמָסָח]] Ps 105:39.—Mic 3:3, La 4:4 v. [[פָּרַס]].
